name: Stickman Jumper: Infinite Orbs
description:
jump around and collect all the orbs for points. forever.

in Jan 2014, before i officially launched my game studio, i tried making a game using a free copy of an old version of GameMaker, so i consider this the "official unofficial first game" by Cosmic Misfit Studio.

use the arrow keys on your keyboard:

  • left/right to move
  • up to jump
  • ESC to respawn Stickman
